name: fleur-cannon
caption: Fleur Cannon

effect.short: Lowers the user's Special Attack by two stages after inflicting damage.
effect.full: Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}, then lowers the user's [Special Attack]{mechanic:special-attack} by two [stages]{mechanic:stage}.

flavorText:
The user unleashes a strong beam. The attack’s
recoil harshly lowers the user’s Sp. Atk stat.
